Class ConfirmationKeyValidator

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.forgerock.openam.oauth2.validation.ConfirmationKeyValidator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AuthorizationCodeRequestValidator, AuthorizeRequestValidator, ClientCredentialsRequestValidator, PasswordCredentialsRequestValidator
    public class ConfirmationKeyValidator
extends Object
implements AuthorizeRequestValidator, AuthorizationCodeRequestValidator, ClientCredentialsRequestValidator, PasswordCredentialsRequestValidator
    Validates the confirmation key parameter if it is present.
